text: Your smile lights up my entire world and makes every day worth living
The way you laugh at my terrible jokes and make me feel like the funniest person alive
How you always know exactly what to say when I'm having a tough day
Your incredible kindness and the way you care for everyone around you
Those late-night conversations where we talk about everything and nothing
How you make ordinary moments feel like magical adventures
The way you support my dreams and believe in me even when I don't believe in myself
Your beautiful eyes that tell a thousand stories every time I look into them
How you make me want to be the best version of myself every single day
The way you dance when you think no one is watching - it's absolutely adorable
Your incredible intelligence and how you challenge me to think differently
How you make even the simplest moments feel special just by being there
